articles.title: Man who accused Kevin Spacey of sexual assault has 10 days to identify himself so civil case can proceed, judge rules - CNN
articles.description: A man who says Kevin Spacey sexually assaulted him in the 1980s when he was 14 has 10 days to identify himself so that a civil case against the actor can proceed, a judge ruled Monday.
